attributes.action: To change the wagon and drag licences to a class one licence
attributes.additional_details: Because of the shortage of class one drivers we the drivers of the old wagon and drag licence could be assessed to be put up to a class one licence
attributes.background: We the drivers of the old wagon and drag licenses want the licence to be made a class one

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to certain licence entitlements, but we're not sure exactly what changes to what licence categories you want to see. You can view current driving licence categories here: https://www.gov.uk/driving-licence-categories

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
